parameters.name: init Optional
parameters.description: A USVString instance, a URLSearchParams instance, a sequence of USVStrings, or a record containing USVStrings. Note that using a URLSearchParams instance is deprecated; soon browsers will just use a USVString for the init.

members.name: URLSearchParams.append()
members.description: Appends a specified key/value pair as a new search parameter.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the parameter to append.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value of the parameter to append.

members.name: URLSearchParams.delete()
members.description: Deletes the given search parameter, and its associated value, from the list of all search parameters.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the parameter to be deleted.

members.name: URLSearchParams.entries()
members.description: Returns an iterator allowing to go through all key/value pairs contained in this object.

members.name: URLSearchParams.get()
members.description: Returns the first value associated to the given search parameter.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the parameter to return.

members.name: URLSearchParams.getAll()
members.description: Returns all the values association with a given search parameter.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the parameter to return.

members.name: URLSearchParams.has()
members.description: Returns a Boolean indicating if such a search parameter exists.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the parameter to find.

members.name: URLSearchParams.keys()
members.description: Returns an iterator allowing to go through all keys of the key/value pairs contained in this object.

members.name: URLSearchParams.set()
members.description: Sets the value associated to a given search parameter to the given value. If there were several values, delete the others.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the parameter to set.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value of the parameter to set.

members.name: URLSearchParams.sort()
members.description: Sorts all key/value pairs, if any, by their keys.

members.name: URLSearchParams.toString()
members.description: Returns a string containing a query string suitable for use in a URL.

members.name: URLSearchParams.values()
members.description: Returns an iterator allowing to go through all values of the key/value pairs contained in this object.
